Iâ€™m a reliable product designer and front-end developer working on websites, applications, and HTML emails.

I believe design is about taking the complex and chaotic and making it accessible to people. I design things to be understandable, readable, responsive, and as fast as possible. Since 2001, Iâ€™ve been trying to create work that is cool enough to show my friends and honest enough to show my parents.

Currently

Off Hours
